APACHE

start "Apache server" /high /B "C:\dokuwiki\server\mapache.exe"

HTTPD.CONF

<IfModule mpm_winnt_module>
    ThreadStackSize 8388608
    ThreadsPerChild 64
</IfModule>

PHP.INI

max_execution_time = 512
max_input_time=214
memory_limit = 888M
post_max_size = 88M
upload_max_filesize = 18M
zend_extension=opcache

CACHE RESET

dokuwiki/conf/local.php
